standard_army.name: Standard Army (Core)
standard_army.description: A well-rounded force for taking on any opponent.

large_shield.name: Large Shield
large_shield.description_short: +2 Save against ranged and +1 Save against everything else.

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.description_short: +1 Save to melee, unless in skirmish, then +1 Save.
buckler.description: +1 Save to melee only, unless in skirmish or loose formation, in which case it gives +1 Save to ranged too.

sling_volley.name: Sling Volley
sling_volley.description: This model can fire twice at short range or 12 inches.

hurled_weapons.name: Hurled Weapons
hurled_weapons.description: When this unit is targeted by an attack with an “Assault“ weapon this unit can make a free Shoot action with this weapon.

skirmisher_formation.name: Skirmisher Formation
skirmisher_formation.description: +1 save against ranged attacks made at long (or =/> 12'') range, -1 Save to Melee.
skirmisher_formation.flavor: This unit is part of a spread out formation, which means it can more easily dodge incoming missiles, but is more vunerable to being rushed by infantry.

vet_skirmisher_formation.name: Veteran Skirmishers
vet_skirmisher_formation.description: +1 save against ranged attacks made at long (or =/> 12'') range, -1 Save to Melee, and +1 to Initiative for rushing.
vet_skirmisher_formation.flavor: This unit is part of a spread out formation, which means it can more easily dodge incoming missiles, but is more vunerable to being rushed by infantry.

light_infantry.name: Light Infantry
light_infantry.description: (This unit cannot use 'Spearmen' Rule) Optional Toggle (During Evade or Move action): Loose formation, +1 save against ranged attacks made at long (or =/> 12'') range, -1 Save to Melee.
light_infantry.flavor: This unit can choose to fight as skirmishers as a loose formation, or 'close up' to fight as traditional infantry.

light_cavalry.name: Light Cavalry
light_cavalry.description: Optional Toggle (During Evade or Move action): +1 save against ranged attacks made at long (or =/> 12'') range, -1 Save to Melee, and +1 to Initiative for rushing.
light_cavalry.flavor: This unit can choose to fight as skirmishers as a loose formation, or 'close up' to fight as medium cavalry.

warband.name: Warband
warband.description_short: +1 to attacking broken units, -1 to saves after becoming broken.
warband.description: +1 to attacking disengaging / falling back units, -1 to saves if disengaging / falling back.
warband.flavor: Warbands are units that due to a lack of professional training, are overconfident in the chase or while being fired upon, but are filled with fear when being chased or seeing the blood of their fellow countrymen.

if_it_bleeds.name: If It Bleeds
if_it_bleeds.description_short: -1 shock for being hit, +2 shock for losing one or more models.
if_it_bleeds.description: -1 shock for being hit, +2 shock for losing one or more models.
if_it_bleeds.flavor: Warbands are units that due to a lack of professional training, are overconfident in the chase or while being fired upon, but are filled with fear when being chased or seeing the blood of their fellow countrymen.

light_footed.name: Light Footed
light_footed.description: This unit gets +1 movement, typically from being a skirmisher or light infantry
light_footed.flavor: With less armor and no shield to weigh them down, these men can be quite nimble.

furious_charge.name: Furious Charge
furious_charge.description_short: Charge and win, enemy unit breaks
furious_charge.description: (Requires War Horse) If this unit charges another and 'wins' the first round of combat, the other unit has to roll a break test. If the other unit has 'stubborn' rule, roll a d6, on a 1,2,or 3 the other unit avoids the break test.
furious_charge.flavor: The fury of heavy cavalry was terrifying to those not prepared for the loud pounding of hooves and for the sheer weight of the charge.

superior_cavalry.name: Superior Cavalry
superior_cavalry.description: (Requires Horse or War Horse) This unit may re-roll failed Strength tests when charging or making a Fight reaction (To a Charge).

mount_horse.name: Mounted (Horse)
mount_horse.description: Increase this model's Movement by 2". This unit may dismount at the end of any Move action. A unit that has dismounted may no longer remount.

war_horse.name: War Horse (Destrier/Stallion)
war_horse.description: Increase Movement by 2". This unit may dismount at the end of any Move action. The unit gets a free, zero AP attack during Fight actions. A unit that has dismounted may no longer remount.

travel_horse.name: Travel Horse (Courser/Pony)
travel_horse.description: Decreases Saves against ranged attacks by 1, but increases Movement by 2". 'light infantry' with this rule, are treated as having the 'light cavalry' rule. This unit may dismount at the end of any Move action. A unit that has dismounted may no longer remount.

lead_by_example.name: Lead By Example
lead_by_example.description: This unit can be merged with any other unit, will be harmed after that unit is.

army_general.name: Army General
army_general.description: Friendly units within 12' of this unit do not experience 'Warband'.

half_horse_armor.name: Half Horse Armor
half_horse_armor.description_short: +1 Save vs attacks from units that are being (By the unit wearing this armor) counterattacked, charged, or were charged or attacked less than a turn ago.

field_orders.name: Field Orders
field_orders.description:
When this unit is activated, choose X friendly Infantry units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses: 
* Re-roll Accuracy rolls of 9+ 
* Re-roll Strength rolls of 9+ 
* +3" Movement 

A unit may only benefit from one Field Order.

stubborn.name: Stubborn
stubborn.description: This model requires 1 additional shock to become broken.

fierce.name: Fierce
fierce.description_short: If an enemy unit in short distance (12') runs away or flees, this unit has to charge them. It gets +1 to melee when it does so
fierce.description: If an enemy unit in short distance (12') runs away or flees, this unit has to charge them. It gets +1 to melee when it does so
fierce.flavor: During the early Dark Ages, some units were exceptionally eager to 'run down' or 'run through' the enemy.

saint.name: Saint
saint.description: Friendly units of X types within 6'' may re-roll a single failed Courage test when removing Shock.

man_of_god.name: Man of God
man_of_god.description: This unit can be merged with any other unit, that unit may re-roll any failed Courage test when removing Shock once per turn.

spearmen.name: Spearmen
spearmen.description: (Note: Requires unmounted, spear and shield) Should this unit do a 'Hold' action and be charged before it's next turn, it has +1 Strength when performing a Counter-Attack reaction. This unit also ignores 'Horseman Warrior Culture'.

pike.name: Pike
pike.description: Should this unit be charged, it has +1 Strength when performing a Counter-Attack reaction and it gets to attack first.

impale.name: Impale
impale.description: (Note: Requires horse or warhorse) This weapon gets +1 AP when used during a Charge.

joust.name: Joust
joust.description: (Note: Requires horse or warhorse) This weapon gets +2 AP when used during a Charge.

warrior_culture.name: Warrior Culture
warrior_culture.description: (Note: Requires attack with melee weapon without 'Reach') This unit gets a +1 Str during a Charge.

mount_warrior_culture.name: Horseman Warrior Culture
mount_warrior_culture.description: (Note: Requires melee weapon and Horse/War Horse) This unit gets a +1 Str during a Charge

light_spearmen.name: Light Spearmen
light_spearmen.description: (Note: Requires unmounted, spear) Should this unit do a 'Hold' action and be charged by Cavalry before it's next turn, it has +1 Strength when performing a Counter-Attack reaction. This unit also ignores 'Horseman Warrior Culture'.

light_professional_swordsmen.name: Light Professional Swordsmen
light_professional_swordsmen.description: (Note: Requires unmounted, Spatha) Should this unit do a 'Hold' action, it has +1 Save when rolling against hits from an opposing Charge action. This unit also ignores 'Warrior Culture'.
